definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Another painful affliction was boils, big and frequent.
sentences.chinese: 另一個折磨我的病痛是癤子，又大又頻繁。

sentences.english: Some mist caused rashes and boils, others delirium and death.
sentences.chinese: 有些霧引起皮疹，癤子，有的精神錯亂而死亡。

sentences.english: But the boil was gone, and all the poison was out of his system.
sentences.chinese: 但是癤子全沒了，所有的毒都離開了他的身體。

sentences.english: The boil on your face has headed.
sentences.chinese: 你臉上的小癤子已經出膿頭了。

sentences.english: Then you're going to die of boils.
You should see a doctor for that boil because it could be something very grave indeed.
sentences.chinese: 你應當去醫院看看這個癤子，可能真的很嚴重呢。

sentences.english: Anyone who has had a boil knows how painful they are.
sentences.chinese: 長過癤子的人都知道那有多疼。

sentences.english: The boil on my arm has ripened.
sentences.chinese: 我胳臂上長的癤子已成熟可以去膿了。

sentences.english: The boil on my chest has matured.
The boil on my right arm rankled whenever I wrote.
sentences.chinese: 每當我寫字的時候，右臂上的癤子就使我感到疼痛。

sentences.english: But a few days later, he got boils on his knees again.
sentences.chinese: 沒幾天，他的膝蓋上又長了癤子。
